data: The organization Greenfield Academy is an educational institution.
The organization Greenfield Academy operates in the Education and Nonprofit industries.
The organization Greenfield Academy provides accessible education to underserved communities to fulfill its mission.
The organization Greenfield Academy was founded in 1995 by educators passionate about inclusive learning.
The organization Greenfield Academy emphasizes STEM, arts, and social responsibility in its curriculum.
The organization Greenfield Academy offers scholarships and community outreach programs to ensure no student is left behind.
The organization Greenfield Academy is located in Austin, Texas, USA and serves both on-campus and online students.
